statements: SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, inquiry_text FROM customer_inquiries WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT inquiry_text FROM customer_inquiries WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_inquiries;
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_id = 1;
SELECT inquiry_text, inquiry_date FROM customer_inquiries WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS inquiry_count FROM customer_inquiries GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries WHERE DATE(inquiry_date) = '2022-01-31' AND inquiry_text LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_inquiries ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries;
SELECT inquiry_id, customer_id FROM customer_inquiries WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT inquiry_text FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_inquiries FROM customer_inquiries GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_inquiries DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM responses WHERE inquiry_id = 10 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT inquiry_id, MAX(inquiry_date) AS latest_inquiry_date FROM customer_inquiries GROUP BY inquiry_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_inquiries FROM customer_inquiries GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.inquiry_text, r.response_text FROM customer_inquiries c LEFT JOIN responses r ON c.inquiry_id = r.inquiry_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_text FROM customer_inquiries ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, inquiry_text FROM customer_inquiries WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM responses WHERE responder_id = 2001 ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT training_id, classifier_label FROM training_data WHERE classifier_label = 'spam';
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM responses WHERE responder_id = 5 AND response_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, inquiry_text FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 23:59:59';
SELECT c.customer_id, r.response_text FROM customer_inquiries c INNER JOIN responses r ON c.inquiry_id = r.inquiry_id;

SELECT c.customer_id AS customer, COUNT(r.response_id) AS number_of_responses FROM customer_inquiries c LEFT JOIN responses r ON c.inquiry_id = r.inquiry_id GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY number_of_responses DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT inquiry_id, customer_id, inquiry_text, inquiry_date FROM CustomerInquiries ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerResponses WHERE inquiry_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT MAX(training_id) AS max_training_id FROM TrainingData;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM CustomerResponses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY response_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_text LIKE '%problem%' ORDER BY inquiry_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT analysis_text, analysis_date FROM CustomerAnalysis INNER JOIN TrainingData ON CustomerAnalysis.analysis_id = TrainingData.analysis_id ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries AS CI JOIN CustomerResponses AS CR ON CI.inquiry_id = CR.inquiry_id JOIN CustomerAnalysis AS CA ON CI.inquiry_id = CA.inquiry_id JOIN TrainingData AS TD ON CA.analysis_id = TD.analysis_id ORDER BY CI.inquiry_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT inquiry_id, customer_id, inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM CustomerResponses WHERE inquiry_id = 2;
SELECT tag_name FROM InquiryTags WHERE tag_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY customer_name DESC

SELECT c.customer_name, i.inquiry_text, r.response_text FROM CustomerDetails c INNER JOIN CustomerInquiries i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id LEFT JOIN CustomerResponses r ON i.inquiry_id = r.inquiry_id
SELECT i.inquiry_text, t.tag_name FROM CustomerInquiries i INNER JOIN InquiryTagRelations itr ON i.inquiry_id = itr.inquiry_id INNER JOIN InquiryTags t ON itr.tag_id = t.tag_id
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inquiries FROM CustomerDetails cd INNER JOIN CustomerInquiries ci ON cd.customer_id = ci.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_inquiries > 1
